Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; ENGRAVED; PAINTED
Name: Terracotta of an orante
Description: Seated feminine figurine representing an orante, with the arms raised and the palms of the hands held out. She wears a tunic of a delicate fabric and her arms and ankles are adorned with bracelets and anklets. There are remnants of the white preparatory ground. The surface is of a dark brown colour. Hollow.
